captions.text:
He is too short 
And has a big big face

He’s too nice 
He seems to have a lot of girls

He brags about 
himself all day

I don’t want much 
I’m not asking for a lot

A little bit tall, and a little 
bit like Gang Dong-won

Someone who kind of understands
How girls feel

Some money 
and not big events

A hundred roses, diamond 
Necklace and ring

The reason I’m not in live 
The reason I’m a single

There are reasons 
There's got to be
There are reasons

Hey I don’t 
ask for a lot
The reason I can’t date

The reason I go 
to meetings alone

There are reasons 
There's got to be
There are reasons
I don’t ask for a lot
I don’t ask for a lot

I really don’t 
ask for a lot

Hey that’s funny, 
I’m the problem?
Honestly do I want a lot?

I’m about average 
Above average anywhere

Someone who says I’m
Prettier than Song hye-kyo

Someone who can take
My personality

I like the kind of man 
Who only knows me

A little bit tall, and a little 
bit like Gang Dong-won

Someone who kind of understands
How girls feel

Some money 
and not big events

A hundred roses, diamond 
Necklace and ring

The reason I’m not in live 
The reason I’m a single

There are reasons 
There's got to be
There are reasons
Hey I don’t ask for a lot
The reason I can’t date

The reason I go 
to meetings alone

There are reasons 
There’s got to be someone
There are reasons
Hey I don’t ask for a lot

What would you need 
If you just have love

Someone who will only 
look at me and love me

It just to be you who 
will only care about me
I don’t ask for a lot
I really don’t ask for a lot

because I heard 3 members were in the original lineup of ExID.﻿

comments.text:
+LovetoChat00 why would they regret it? If they hadn't left, they would 
probably never meet Dahye and BESTie is perfect that way. They don't fit 
EXID style so I'm happy they left. And btw. Hyeyeon left to study. 
Haeryeong wanted to practice acting... and they have dedicated fans like 
myself. I don't think they lost in any point. I don't think they regret 
leaving either. So you can't really say "Hope they learned a lesson not to 
give up" when you clearly don't know anything... Please, support EXID on 
EXID videos, because I believe that's where you should do that :) And don't 
answer impolitely to me, I beg you because I am nice to you.
